# tabView

**Type Property**

A background placement inside a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView].

## Declaration

```swift
static let tabView: ContainerBackgroundPlacement
```

## Getting placements

- **navigation**: A background placement inside a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationStack] or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationSplitView].
- **widget**: The container background placement for a widget.
